str2: However, nevertheless, but, except that, yet. From pleion; moreover, i.e. Albeit, save that, rather, yet.
Woe!, alas!, uttered in grief or denunciation. A primary exclamation of grief; 'woe'.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Rich, abounding in, wealthy; subst: a rich man. From ploutos; wealthy; figuratively, abounding with.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have in full, be far, it is enough. From apo and echo; to have out, i.e. Receive in full; to keep away, i.e. Be distant.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
